description.value: ValueSet IMMZD2DTMeningococcalQuadrivalentConjugateVaccines2Doses for IMMZ.D2.DT.Meningococcal.Quadrivalent conjugate vaccines 2 doses. Business rule: Determine if the client is due for a meningococcal vaccination according to the national immunization schedule Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any Table: Quadrivalent conjugate vaccines (A,C,W135,Y-D), 2-dose schedule
